name: River Road
description: Another segment of the 'managed eco-corridor' of River Road, where the distant, harmonious thrum of civic utilities is artfully blended with the algorithmically generated rustling of bio-engineered leaves. You traverse River Road, a polished synth-ribbon that feels increasingly detached from the city's hyper-efficient core. The chrono-pavement here exhibits fewer 'wear patterns,' yet the subtle, pervasive sense of 'managed entropy' persists, a gentle reminder of Hill Valley's carefully curated, yet ultimately fading, narrative of progress. The air is precisely filtered, carrying the simulated scent of 'damp earth' and the faint, algorithmically generated murmur of the bio-remediated river nearby.
